detail_desc: Jacket woven in a textured cotton blend with notch lapels, welt front pockets with a flap, and no fasteners. Lined.

Metal stud earrings in various sizes and designs. Size from 0.3 cm to 0.6 cm.

Knee-length coat in woven fabric containing some wool with narrow notch lapels and a tie belt at the waist. Side pockets, a single back vent and no buttons. Unlined.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Coat in a fine-knit wool blend with a small collar and detachable tie belt at the waist. Side pockets, a single back vent and no buttons. Unlined.

Cold shoulder dress in patterned jersey with a flounce at the top, seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.

Short parka in cotton twill. Hood with a faux fur lining, stand-up collar, zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front, zipped chest pocket, flap front pockets with a press-stud and press-studs at the cuffs. Concealed drawstring at the waist and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Partly lined in faux fur.
Wide, sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck with a pleat centre front. Rounded hem, longer at the back.

Pyjamas with a top and bottoms in soft, patterned jersey. Top with a lace-trimmed V-neck, long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with narrow elastication at the waist and lace-trimmed hems.

Pyjamas with a top and bottoms in soft, patterned jersey. Top with a lace-trimmed V-neck, long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with narrow elastication at the waist and lace-trimmed hems.
Nightshirt in a soft viscose weave with a V-neck, frilled collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with elastication and a frill at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Nightshirt in a soft viscose weave with a V-neck, frilled collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with elastication and a frill at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Pyjamas with a long-sleeved top in cotton jersey and trousers in soft cotton twill. Top with buttons down the front. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Pyjamas with a long-sleeved top in cotton jersey and trousers in soft cotton twill. Top with buttons down the front. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Faux fur gilet with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front and pockets in the side seams. Satin lining.
Jacket in soft pile with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front, patch pockets, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Lined.

Warm-lined jacket in imitation leather with notch lapels, a diagonal zip at the front and welt side pockets. Adjustable tabs with metal buckles at the cuffs and a detachable tie belt with a metal buckle at the hem. Faux fur lining.
Long-sleeved dress in a cotton weave with appliqués, a button at the back of the neck and a yoke with decorative gathers front and back. Unlined.
Metal watch with an adjustable strap in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width of strap 1.5 cm, total length 22 cm. Diameter of watch 3.6 cm.
Lightly padded, quilted weekend bag with two handles, a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap and a zip at the top. Two inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Reinforced base. Size 17x35x56 cm.

Spacious handbag in sturdy imitation leather with two handles, and a magnetic fastener at the top and a decorative strap with a covered metal fastener at the front. Two inner compartments, one with a zip, and studs on the bottom. Unlined. Size 15.5x32x36.5 cm.
